companyTagline: Decentralised Energy and Commodity Trading Platform
aboutText: BlockEnergy (BE) is a decentralised platform leveraging blockchain, AI, and DeFi to revolutionise global energy and commodity trading. BE enables Transactive Energy, petroleum product trading, and carbon credit trading with transparency and efficiency.
feature1: Decentralised Trading: Powered by Fetch.ai’s Autonomous Economic Agents (AEAs).
feature2: AI-Driven Insights: Enhanced by DeepSeek’s analytics and automation.
feature3: Multi-Currency StableCoins: CBDC-pegged StableCoins for cross-border transactions.
feature4: Regulatory Compliance: Automated compliance with EU ETS, Chinese carbon credit frameworks, and more.
feature5: Sustainability: Supporting green energy projects and EV infrastructure.
tech1: Fetch.ai: AEAs for decentralized trading and IoT integration.
tech2: DeepSeek: AI for market analysis, risk assessment, and document automation.
tech3: Blockchain: Built on Cosmos SDK for scalability and interoperability.
tech4: Web3: Decentralized hosting on IPFS and blockchain-based authentication.
roadmapQ2: Pilot projects (EV charging in GBA, transactive energy grid in EU)
roadmapQ3: Full deployment (carbon credit trading, petroleum product trading)
roadmapQ4: Global expansion (Asia, EU, North America, Middle East)
token2:
Carbon Credits
Tokenised EUAs and Chinese carbon credits
web3Text: Connect your wallet to interact with BlockEnergy’s decentralised platform.
footerText: BlockEnergy is a registered business name of CRIL, Ireland, and SKL, HKSAR.
